scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: In four boxes, numbered 1-4. Kent's letters are arranged chronologically in Boxes 2: (1918-1940); 3: (1941-1969).

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: *In addition to the project listing below, a sortable inventory of the drawings can be consult in this downloadable Excel spreadsheet.
